text: The Fateful Day () is a 1995 Iranian drama movie directed by Shahram Assadi and was based on novel of the same name by Bahram Beyzai. It stars Mohammad- Ali Keshavarz, Ezzatolah Entezami, Alireza Shoja Nouri, Zhaleh Olov, Jamshid Mashayekhi. ==Other websites== * Category:1994 drama movies Category:Iranian movies
title: The Fateful Day
